publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1514 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committees—That the Parliament agrees the following designation of Lead Committee— The Health and Community Care Committee to consider the Fresh Meat (Beef Controls) (No. 2) Amendment (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (SSI 2000/449) and the Feeding Stuffs (Scotland) Regulations 2000 (SSI 2000/453). Supported by: Tavish Scott*
